text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly discusses the US filing process, stating: \"You can file based on either actual use in US commerce or a bona fide *intent to use* (ITU)\" and further clarifies: \"If you file ITU, you must eventually demonstrate actual use before the registration will fully issue.\" This directly addresses the requirement of the criterion regarding the necessity of filing a Statement of Use (SOU) or Request for Extension after an ITU filing before final registration.", "criterion_id": "8b8d3fe3-25aa-4b9b-9b24-1983d2892740"}
